package.name: BT_Custompayment
package.summary: This extension adds a new payment method.
package.description:
Custom Payment Method
This extension will help you to add your own payment method without changing any core files .
This extension is very helpful for developers and merchants.
Features:
No core file changed. A small useful extension for payment. Works on Magento 1.6 and above.
Supported Features:
Admin go to System->Configuration->Sales->Payment Method->BT Payment Module now you can enable/disable this extension from admin.
A new payment method is displayed automatically at the time of checkout on payment page.
Installation:
Install Extension Using Magento Connect Enable it from admin
